DOC.brief_summary: This study compare efficacy CellCept [ 0.5-2 gram per day ( g/day ) orally ( p.o . ) ] cyclophosphamide [ 0.5-1 gram per square meter ( g/m2 ) quarterly ] maintenance treatment patient lupus nephritis . All patient receive induction treatment cyclophosphamide ( 0.5-1g/m2 monthly ) 6 month , randomize maintenance phase study 6 month , follow 6 month treatment-free follow-up . The anticipated time study treatment 12 month .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy CellCept ( Mycophenolate Mofetil ) Patients With Lupus Nephritis
DOC.criteria: adult patient > =18 year age ; diagnosis systemic lupus erythematosus lupus nephritis ( class III , IV V ) . patient receive cytotoxic drug previous 8 week ; systemic infection ; hepatitis B C , HIV .
